languages.text: {n}Вы демонстративно убираете руку от рычага — и пинаете ногой реле переключения сети, расположенное на нижней части корпуса когитатора. Экран моментально выключается, а рык в глубинах машины захлебывается сам собой. Взглянув на разъем инфокрипты, вы убеждаетесь, что когти бессильно разжались, и без труда извлекаете инфокрипту из гнезда.{/n}

{n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы демонстративно убираете руку от рычага — и пинаете ногой реле переключения сети, расположенное на нижней части корпуса когитатора. Экран моментально выключается, а рык в глубинах машины захлебывается сам собой. Взглянув на разъем инфокрипты, вы убеждаетесь, что когти бессильно разжались, и без труда извлекаете инфокрипту из гнезда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located below the cogitator's hull. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the cybercrypt connector reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the cybercrypt from its socket.{/n}

The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the cybercrypt connector reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the cybercrypt from its socket.{/n}

Checking the cybercrypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the cybercrypt from its socket.{/n}

{n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the cybercrypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the cybercrypt from its socket.{/n}

{n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你缩回了手，假装无意触碰电源拉杆，但随后一脚踢在沉思者机箱下半部分的电力传输继电器上。屏幕立即关闭，沉思者内部的咆哮声也自行平息下来。你检查着数据密存器的端口，发现金属爪已经松开了。你毫不费力地将数据密存器拔了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你缩回了手，假装无意触碰电源拉杆，但随后一脚踢在思考器机箱下半部分的电力传输继电器上。屏幕立即关闭，思考器内部的咆哮声也自行平息下来。你检查着数据密存器的端口，发现金属爪已经松开了。你毫不费力地将数据密存器拔了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apartas la mano de la palanca haciendo ostentación del gesto y rápidamente das una patada al relé de transferencia de energía que hay en la mitad inferior de la carcasa del cogitador. La pantalla se apaga inmediatamente y el gruñido de la máquina se calla gradualmente. Al comprobar el puerto de cripta de datos, compruebas que las garras han aflojado la presa y extraes la cripta sin dificultad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apartas la mano de la palanca haciendo ostentación del gesto y rápidamente das una patada al relé de transferencia de energía que hay en la mitad inferior de la carcasa del cogitador. La pantalla se apaga inmediatamente y el gruñido de la máquina se calla gradualmente. Al comprobar el puerto de cripta de datos, compruebas que las garras han aflojado la presa y extraes la cripta sin dificultad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}これみよがしにレバーから手を離し、考算機本体の下半分、電力移行中継機を蹴る。画面がすぐにシャットダウンして、機械内の唸り声はスッとおさまった。データ・クリプトポートを確認すれば爪が緩んでおり、ソケットからデータ・クリプトを簡単に取り出せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}これみよがしにレバーから手を離し、考算機本体の下半分、電力移行中継機を蹴る。画面がすぐにシャットダウンして、機械内の唸り声はスッとおさまった。データ・クリプトポートを確認すれば爪が緩んでおり、ソケットからデータ・クリプトを簡単に取り出せた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du entfernst deine Hand übertrieben deutlich von dem Hebel – und trittst gegen das Energieübertragungsrelais in der unteren Hälfte des Cogitator-Gehäuses. Der Bildschirm schaltet sofort ab, und das Knurren in der Maschine verstummt. Du siehst, dass die Klauen die Daten-Krypta nicht mehr festhalten, und ziehst sie problemlos aus ihrem Sockel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du entfernst deine Hand übertrieben deutlich von dem Hebel – und trittst gegen das Energieübertragungsrelais in der unteren Hälfte des Cogitator-Gehäuses. Der Bildschirm schaltet sofort ab, und das Knurren in der Maschine verstummt. Du siehst, dass die Klauen die Daten-Krypta nicht mehr festhalten, und ziehst sie problemlos aus ihrem Sockel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous montrez bien que vous éloignez votre main du levier... puis donnez un coup de pied dans le relais de transfert électrique situé sur la partie inférieure du boîtier. L'écran s'éteint immédiatement et le grognement finit par s'estomper. Vous parvenez aisément à extraire la crypte de données, libérée de l'emprise des griffes qui l'enserraient.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous montrez bien que vous éloignez votre main du levier... puis donnez un coup de pied dans le relais de transfert électrique situé sur la partie inférieure du boîtier. L'écran s'éteint immédiatement et le grognement finit par s'estomper. Vous parvenez aisément à extraire la crypte de données, libérée de l'emprise des griffes qui l'enserraient.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aheste aheste elini koldan çekiyor, kavramsayar kasasının alt kısmında bulunan güç aktarım rölesine aniden tekmeyi geçiriyorsun. Ekran anında kararıyor, makinenin içinden gelen hırıltı da kendiliğinden yok oluyor. Veri mahzeni çıkışına baktığında pençelerin açıldığını görüyor, zorlanmadan yuvasından çıkarıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You make a show of removing your hand from the lever — and kick the power transfer relay located on the lower half of the cogitator's casing. The screen immediately shuts down and the snarling inside the machine peters out on its own. Checking the data-crypt port reveals the claws have unclenched, and you easily extract the data-crypt from its socket.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aheste aheste elini koldan çekiyorsun… Kavramsayar kasasının alt kısmında bulunan güç aktarım rölesine aniden tekmeyi geçiriyorsun. Ekran anında kararıyor, makinenin derinlerinde hırıltı kendiliğinden yok oluyor. Veri mahzeni çıkışına baktığında pençelerin açıldığını görüyor, zorlanmadan yuvasından çıkarıyorsun.{/n}
